lead_paragraph: Fred Funk got off to a fast start in his third career Champions Tour event, shooting a six-under 65 to take a one-stroke lead in the AT&T Championship at San Antonio. The 50-year-old Funk, a seven-time winner on the PGA Tour, had six birdies in his bogey-free round. Scott Simpson, Dan Pohl and R.W. Eaks were one shot back.
